title: Had enough snow?
content:

I thought we had it worst here on the North East Coast of North America until I saw this video...

comments.content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819083403im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Snowed_in_5816.jpg)
  
So beautiful, so quiet.  
Working from home I don’t have to commute; the day of the big snowfall walked to the coffee shop in the p.m. as per usual—a good workout.  
But I did have to shovel eventually. Another good workout!  
It’s too much about driving, but that’s the way the system works.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819083403im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Snowed)in2_5721.jpg)

We seldom get snow here, but when we do we roll out the [Snowovel](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819083403/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=ky6emJPFIWo): still a good workout, but less strain on the back.

I've been out snow shoeing everyday now since :)
